Module roborally
Package utilities

Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
utilities.Coordinate
public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
A Coordinate saves the 2 dimensional x and y position of gameObjects on the map.
Author:
simon

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public static Coordinate parse​(int position)
      Parses a one-dimensional position on the map into a two-dimensional Coordinate.
      Parameters:
      position - Position on the map starting from top right to bottom left.
      Returns:
      Coordinate of the given position.

    • distance

      calculates the distance between two Coordinates.
      Parameters:
      from - Coordinate
      to - different Coordinate
      Returns:
      distance between the Coordinate

    • toPosition

      public int toPosition()
      Converts this Coordinate into a one-dimensional position on the map starting from top right to bottom left.
      Returns:
      position on the map.

    • clone

      public Coordinate clone()
      Creates a clone of this Coordinate, which is on the same x and y position. 
      x.clone() != x
      x.clone().getClass() == x.getClass()
      x.clone().equals(x)
      Overrides:
      clone in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a clone of this Coordinate.
